Subject: 21 Missing Strict Transport Security Headers
Description:
Noted that the application doesnâ€™t have HSTS header implemented

Steps to Reproduce:
Verify the response headers of application for Strict Transport Security header.

11.5 AIC
What_We_Know__c:
HTTP Strict Transport Security Headers (HSTS) are Included in the Published Reports site by default.
HSTS requires all HTTP requests to be forced over HTTPS this can be enabled for the AIC by editing the web.config by uncommenting the rewrite section.
For AIC version 11.5.0.137 this includes lines 270 through 296

See past support ticket #368629
Next_Steps__c: The AIC (11.6+) and Webserver (11.0+) adds the "Strict-Transport-Security" header to the response if the SSL is enabled.
Solution_Comment__c:
The AIC (11.6+) and Webserver (11.0+) adds the "Strict-Transport-Security" header to the response if the SSL is enabled.

The resolution related the the webserver was addressed in product release notes, the update AIC was never documented.

https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/z-kb-articles-salesforce/page/kA04u0000000I0wCAE.html
